trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Inserting"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Updating"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Deleting"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Inserting"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Updating"> </xref>, og <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Deleting"> </xref> hendelser.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext"></xref> used by the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext"> </xref> brukes av datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The object context used by the data source.
Gets the object being added, modified, or updated.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektet som legges til, er endret eller oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that was thrown while the data was being validated before the insert, update, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter unntak oppstod under dataene ble valideres før insert-, oppdatere eller slette operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Unntaket, hvis det oppstod en feilen; Ellers en <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> referanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om unntaket ble håndtert, og at den ikke må være et nytt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis unntaket ble håndtert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
